name: Ebony on Maple Bentwood Anniversary Rings
description:
This is a beautiful set of matching handmade bentwood rings. It is Ebony wrapped around a Maple Liner are shown, as well as Brazilian Rosewood on a Maple liner. We also offer Maple on Maple. Or, if you have a special request, feel free to contact us. 

THESE ARE MADE TO ORDER RINGS. Simply share your ring size, and desired width and we do the rest. You will receive your ring in about 7-10 days after we receive the order.

Made in the bentwood fashion, this is a durable ring. It has an acrylic finish that will withstand water and heat. No need to remove it as you go about your day. This ring is made to be worn everyday.

We provide a warranty against breaking for a full year. We expect these rings to last for a long time.

Remember, you would like a similar ring, in a different size or wood species, let us know. We have more than 40 woods in stock and can have a custom, handmade ring to you in 7-10 days.

You will be pleased with these rings.
